Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to providing a tobacco use disorder
Summary: Requires an alcohol or substance use disorder facility to assess all individuals admitted to their facility for tobacco use disorder.
LawCode: Add ยง19.46, amd ยง1.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing a tobacco use disorder
